overview: They are two very different people.  She's a strong-willed heiress running away from a loveless arranged marriage; he's a happy-go-lucky biker running away from responsibility.  Yet, despite the glaring differences, they are drawn to each other when they meet.  They have found in each other a friend, a confidante, a lover; they have found in each other the missing pieces of their own true selves.
title: Forever
